subject: BoostCamp 7.0

body:
Attention fellow students! This is to notify you regarding the inception of ISCBEU, a council dedicated to enhancing on campus student life and organizing various educational and social student's clubs and events and festivals on campus for all the students of BEU. Further announcement for Educational Student's Clubs: The Directorate of Education Student's Club of ISCBEU wishes to organize 3 distinct educational clubs in English, on campus, namely: i. Programming Club ii. Front end developer Club iii.Game Developer Club Those who are hopeful to join these clubs are requested to fill out the Google Form and contact The Director of Education Student's Club, Abdullah Azharuddeen, for further queries. Google Form: https://cutt.ly/gNPRcW2
Contact: +994 50 630 32 49
Email: amuhammedhazharuddeen@std.beu.edu.az Thank you.
